name: 12Games12Weeks - 2 - Top Down Shooter
description:
2nd Game for my #12Games12Weeks Challenge - A Top Down Shooter. Making 12 Minimal Viable Product level games in 12 weeks.
Challenge information here: https://12games12weeks.blogspot.com/

  • Controls:
    • Keyboard/mouse:
      • WASD or Arrow keys to move
      • esc for menu
      • q to cycle weapon
      • Space to dash
      • mouse to aim
      • left mouse to shoot
    • X-box (compatible) controller 
      • left stick to move
      • start for menu
      • RB to cycle weapon
      • LB to dash
      • right stick to aim
      • right trigger to shoot
